General.Name: Remed Co.Ltd
General.Description: Remed Co,.Ltd. engages in the research and development of medical devices to treat brain disorders worldwide. The company offers transcranial magnetic stimulator, an equipment that utilizes electromagnets to generate a magnetic field for the treatment of mental disorders, such as depression and anxiety. It also provides products for stroke and perkins diseases, as well as electromagnetic stimulation therapy and extracorporeal shockwave therapy devices for musculoskeletal pain therapy. In addition, it offers neuro magnetic stimulation systems for urinary incontinence. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Daejeon, South Korea.
